lead_paragraph: Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt fought to keep his job at Riverdale Jewish Center after drawing scrutiny for naked sauna sessions years ago with boys as young as 12.

headline.print_headline: Bronx Rabbi Who Held Naked Sauna Chats With Young Boys Will Step Down
headline.main: Bronx Rabbi Who Had Sauna Chats Is Quitting

snippet: Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt fought to keep his job at Riverdale Jewish Center after drawing scrutiny for naked sauna sessions years ago with boys as young as 12.
abstract: Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt is stepping down from his position at Riverdale Jewish Center in wake of revelation that he held naked sauna chats with boys as young as 12; hundreds of members of congregation quit over revelations.
